Docs.summary: Provides access and information for manipulating I/O streams within a .
Gets the setting for the stream.
Docs.value: The compression option setting for the package stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the CompressionOption property returns CompressionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption>.

Docs.summary: Gets the setting for the stream.
Docs.value: The encryption option setting for the package stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601.Enumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> has been called on the stream, the EncryptionOption property returns EncryptionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This GetStream method (without parameters), opens the stream in file mode <xref:System.IO.FileMode> with the default storage root <xref:System.IO.FileAccess>.
